subject: Last CFP - Dubai - Jan. 28-30, 2015
from: "The International Conference on Digital Information Processing, Data Mining, and Wireless Communications (DIPDMWC2015)" <donotreply@sdiwc.us>
body:
URL: http://sdiwc.net/conferences/dipdmwc2015/ +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ The proposed conference that will be held in Dubai on January 28-30, 2015. +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ - All the registered papers will be published in publisher's Digital Library and in the proceedings of the conference. - All the submitted papers will be reviewed by a minimum of two reviewers. - The published proceedings will be submitted for POSSIBLE indexing by at least five or more of the following: DBLP, EI, INSPEC, Research Bible, Scirus, Microsoft Academic Research, ResearchGate, and Google Scholar Databases. - In addition, BEST registered papers will be published in special issue journals ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ Important dates: - Submission Date: The submission is open from now until Jan. 08, 2015 - Notification of Acceptance: 2-3 weeks from the submission date - Camera Ready Submission: Open from now until Jan. 18, 2015 - Last Day for Registration: open from now until Jan. 18, 2015 Conference Dates: Jan. 28-30, 2015 ---------------------------------------- If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://sdiwc.us/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=d67fac30874ed23b1c8bf6f96d9f2cb5 URL: http://sdiwc.net/conferences/dipdmwc2015/

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
The proposed conference that will be held in Dubai on January 28-30, 2015.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
- All the registered papers will be published in publisher's Digital Library and in the proceedings of the conference.
- All the submitted papers will be reviewed by a minimum of two reviewers.
- The published proceedings will be submitted for POSSIBLE indexing by at least five or more of the following: DBLP, EI, INSPEC, Research Bible, Scirus, Microsoft Academic Research, ResearchGate, and Google Scholar Databases.
- In addition, BEST registered papers will be published in special issue journals

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
Important dates:

- Submission Date: The submission is open from now until Jan. 08, 2015
- Notification of Acceptance: 2-3 weeks from the submission date
- Camera Ready Submission: Open from now until Jan. 18, 2015
- Last Day for Registration: open from now until Jan. 18, 2015
Conference Dates: Jan. 28-30, 2015
